name: Arctic Upgrade
description:
An eskimo wakes up after feeling the earth shaking. He then goes outside to find out what happened. 

-A puzzle platformer with a ability gimmick. 

-Made in 72h for Ludum Dare. 

-NES graphics and chiptunes. 

-A secret ending! 

(Controls explained in-game)

The original Flash version (which is available for download) was made for Ludum Dare 24, I ported it to HTML5 due to browsers dropping Flash support since the game's original release. Aside from this, there're no changes between the two versions.
